sections.title_cn: 1.本表由申请机构按照所申请的业务种类、级次和对应业务发生的行政区域分别填写，即每
sections.title_en: 1. This form is to be filled in by the applicant organization according to the type and level of business applied for and the administrative area where the corresponding business occurs, that is, each
sections.body_cn: 份申请表仅限勾选一个业务种类、一个业务级次；
sections.body_en: Each application form can only check one business type and one business level;

sections.title_cn: 2.“业务级次”根据勾选的级次填写业务对应发生的行政区域，仅限填写一个行政区域；
sections.title_en: 2. "Business level" fills in the administrative area where the business occurs according to the checked level, and only one administrative area can be filled in;

sections.title_cn: 3.“部门联系方式”根据申请机构的部门分工和业务需要填写；
sections.title_en: 3. "Department contact information" should be filled in according to the division of labor and business needs of the applicant organization;

sections.title_cn: 4.文书送达方式选择“邮寄”时，通讯地址应为接收资格认定相关文书的地址。
sections.title_en: 4. When "mail" is selected as the document delivery method, the correspondence address should be the address for receiving documents related to qualification certification.
sections.body_cn:
-9-

附 2
国库集中收付代理银行资格认定申请书主要内容
一、前 10 大股东控股情况。申请机构总行的前 10 大股东及
实际控制人、股东类别、持股比例、股份类型等。
二、部门设置与分工。申请机构与代理国库集中收付业务相
关的部门设置、下级机构设置和职责分工等情况，包括但不限于
申请机构的代理业务所在部门、主办行、清算行、清算业务涉及
的其他部门和职责分工等。
三、机构网点数量与分布。在所申请代理的国库集中收付业
务归属行政区域内，申请机构的网点总数量、网点类型情况和实
际提供办理相应代理业务的网点数量。
四、内控管理建设。与代理国库集中收付业务相关的制度建
设、风险控制、人员配备和培训情况等。
五、资金汇划渠道。与代理国库集中收付业务相关的资金支
付清算系统设置、资金通道和账户情况。
六、信息系统建设。与代理国库集中收付业务相关的信息系
统建设、运维和保障情况。
七、代理国库相关业务开展情况。申请机构及其分支机构代
理国库相关业务开展情况，包括代理支库、代理乡镇国库、代理
国库经收处、代理国库集中收付、代理储蓄国债发行兑付、参与
国库现金管理等业务。
八、服务承诺。
10

九、其他信息。
11
sections.body_en:
-9-

Appendix 2
The main contents of the application form for the qualification of the national treasury centralized collection and payment agent bank
1. Holdings of the top 10 largest shareholders. The top 10 shareholders of the applicant institution’s head office and
Actual controller, shareholder category, shareholding ratio, share type, etc.
2. Department setup and division of labor. The applicant institution is related to the agency treasury centralized collection and payment business
related department setup, subordinate organization setup and division of responsibilities, including but not limited to
The department, sponsoring bank, clearing bank, and clearing business involved in the agency business of the applicant institution
Other departments and division of responsibilities, etc.
3. Number and distribution of institutional outlets. Centralized collection and payment industry in the treasury for which you are applying for agency
Within the administrative area to which the business belongs, the total number of outlets, outlet types and actual situation of the applicant institution
Internationally provide the number of outlets that handle corresponding agency services.
4. Construction of internal control management. System construction related to agency treasury centralized collection and payment business
equipment, risk control, staffing and training, etc.
5. Fund transfer channels. Fund disbursements related to the agency treasury centralized collection and payment business
Payment and clearing system settings, fund channels and account status.
6. Information system construction. Information system related to agency treasury centralized collection and payment business
System construction, operation and maintenance and support status.
7. Acting on the development of treasury-related business. The applicant organization and its branches represent
Manage the development of treasury-related business, including agency branch treasury, agency township treasury, agency
National Treasury Economic and Revenue Department, agency for centralized collection and payment of the treasury, agency for issuance and redemption of savings treasury bonds, participation in
Treasury cash management and other services.
8. Service commitment.
10

9. Other information.
11
